sqlMap.sql: SELECT a.USERID, a.USERNAME, a.SEX, a.DEPTID, b.DEPTNAME, DATE_FORMAT(c.time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as time

(SELECT a.USERID as USERID, max(c.Time) as time FROM eauser a, gpsinfo c, releategpsinfo d where c.GPSInfo_Id = d.GPSInfo_Id and d.Type = 1 and d.ReleateRecordId = a.USERID
a.DEPTID like '$deptid$%'
a.USERNAME like '%$userName$%'
c.Time > '$datetime$'
GROUP BY a.USERID) c WHERE a.userid = c.userid and a.deptid=b.deptid
SELECT name, type, DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as time, info
concat('{gpsinfoid:', cast(c.GPSInfo_Id as char(32)), ', longtitude:', cast(c.Longtitude as char(32)), ', latitude:', cast(c.Latitude as char(32)), ', speed:', cast(c.speed as char(32))

(SELECT a.USERNAME as name, 1 as type, c.Time as time,
FROM eauser a, gpsinfo c, releategpsinfo d where c.GPSInfo_Id = d.GPSInfo_Id and d.Type = 1 and d.ReleateRecordId = a.USERID
a.DEPTID like '$deptid$%'
a.USERNAME like '%$infoName$%'
c.Time > '$datetime$'
)

UNION (SELECT a.Name as name, 2 as type, c.Time as time,
FROM device a, gpsinfo c, releategpsinfo d, region e where c.GPSInfo_Id = d.GPSInfo_Id and d.Type = 2 and d.ReleateRecordId = a.Device_ID and a.REGION_ID = e.REGION_ID
e.DEPTID like '$deptid$%'
a.Name like '%$infoName$%'
c.Time > '$datetime$'
)
, ', inspectplanid:', cast(g.InspectPlan_ID as char(32)), ', inspectplandeviceid:', cast(f.InspectPlanDevice_ID as char(32))

UNION (SELECT t.name, t.type, t.time, t.info FROM (SELECT concat(i.deptname, h.username, '执行', g.Name, '检查', a.Name) as name, 3 as type, c.Time as time,
FROM device a, gpsinfo c, releategpsinfo d, region e, InspectPlanDevice f, InspectPlan g, eauser h, eadept i where c.GPSInfo_Id = d.GPSInfo_Id and d.Type = 3 and d.ReleateRecordId = f.InspectPlanDevice_ID and g.InspectPlan_ID = f.InspectPlan_ID AND f.DEVICE_ID = a.DEVICE_ID and a.REGION_ID = e.REGION_ID and g.ExecuteUserId = h.userID and h.DEPTID=i.DEPTID
e.DEPTID like '$deptid$%'
(g.Name like '%$infoName$%' OR a.Name like '%$infoName$%')
c.Time > '$datetime$'
) t
t.Name like '%$infoName$%'
)
